title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        New Park Entrance  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, New Park Entrance  The park entrance is now located off of Hwy 62 due to highway expansion and is 1.3 miles east of the intersection of Hwy 62 and Hwy 72. Call the park for more information. (479) 451-8122.          GPS location issues  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, GPS location issues  Due to the hwy 62 expansion, many GPS devices are unable to locate the park visitor center. Google maps is currently the most accurate way-finding program available. Search for "Pea Ridge National Military Park" rather than the numerical address.          Ford Road Closure 8/12/2016  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Ford Road Closure 8/12/2016  Ford Road is CLOSED today while contractors are bringing in their equipment for a project.          Horse Trail Closure  Alert 4 , Severity ,information ,, Horse Trail Closure  Starting Monday, August 15, 2016, both horse trails will be CLOSED on weekdays due to cedar removal contract work until the end of August. The horse trails will be OPEN on the weekends. For information please call  479-451-8122 x 1227.
